channel.title: Is it possible the get the external IP address of a remote network on omegle using just the text side?
channel.description:
Wondering if its possible to get the external address of someone using the chat side of omegle. The video side works using UDP, but it looks like the text side is relayed through a bunch of relays which means I am probably out of luck... I understand posting a URL that redirects to capture it in the chat window could grab the info theoretically.
Any thoughts?

item.title: Is it possible the get the external IP address of a remote network on omegle using just the text side?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible the get the external IP address of a remote network on omegle using just the text side?
item.dc:creator: DarkEyes
item.description:
I’d say just send them an IP logger. I like https://iplogger.org and grabify. iplogger.org will let you pick your filename extension, so you could make it a picture file ext.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible the get the external IP address of a remote network on omegle using just the text side?
